reviews.sentence: Gorgeous view great staff free parking and wifi. Comfy bed. Nice sized room. Amazing food at the restaurant and quick service. The parking attendant was so sweet. The patio and furnishings are great. Wish I cold have stayed and playedI would not sit on the couch in the room. It had some dubious spots on it and upon lifting the cushions I was grossed out my the stains. Room could use some refurb but all in all it is not too bad. I was unfortunately on a biz trip but they have water craft rentals water slides pools and spa. More than one place in resort to eat or drink and walking distance to the local beach. Quick off the freeway and ample parking. Beautiful property.

Mission Bay Oasis for the Non Business Traveler. In town on business and wanted to stay with Hyat as a Gold Passport member. Unfortunately the more appropriate locations downtown were full due to a conference so I went with the Hyat Regency. The location on Mission Bay is great with tons of vacations style amenities. However it is not the best option for business travel for obvious reasons. The adjoining room was a bit loud one night during my stay but that is to be expected from vacationers. Hot water was much more limited than I would have expected. My biggest complaint though was being charged a nightly resort fee when I was not able to use any of the resort amenities. Just be clear on all the policies prior to making your reservation. However if you are a family looking for a great vacation this is a great location.

Nice hotel with excellent amenities. Hotel and amenities were excellent. Very clean and spectacular views from the tower. Great pool and restaurant. Our only complaint was the noise the hotel was hosting a bunch of parties and we had noise that kept us up every night. People making noise and running through the halls people in adjacent rooms with TVs way too loud no fault of the Hotel and they did take care of this and a company party held in their tent which had a DJ with very loud music. Not sure why they would host a party with DJ in their tent obviously a tent will do nothing to contain noise. They also need to do a better job of monitoring noise when they have party guests staying in their hotel so their other guests are not bothered. Also a small issue with no hot water in the shower the day we left. Spectacular view from the tower very clean excellent amenities great location. Excellent location very close to Sea World close to the Zoo and down town close to airport. Better hotel security to monitor noise do not host loud parties in the tent.

In the middle of nowhere should not have to pay additional fee per night when at other hotels the facilities are included in price. and 370 night to park your car. Ridiculous. Not even a microwave which we have had in the most cheapest hotels.

Very smelly room that made room feel dirty with HORRIBLE beds. Location and parking proximity and availability of spaces to room. Room was VERY smelly. Had to open the windows and keep them open to tolerate the stench. Bed was HORRIBLE. My 13 and 16 yr olds who are very fit and healthy had sore backs from the VERY old and sunken mattresses. The box springs made noise with any movement. The nightly parking fee of 37 is higher than anywhere we have stayed. There is no laundry facility on site.

All in all we had a wonderful time and we will be back. The pools are awesome. The location is beautiful and full of options for activities. The staff was very nice. The free bike rentals were a real highlight for us. The cost of parking was outrageous. We had to wait in the hotel lobby line on several occasions to get our adjoining rooms situated even though I asked well in advance costing valuable time. 45 minutes total. We were not allowed to stay in the tower rooms because they had no adjoining rooms available at check in.

would not stay again. Will go to a moderately priced hotel with better amenities. I can go find the. The view was awesome from the 10th floor tower room. The pools and water slides were great. To have known about the 38 per night required parking fee. before making the reservation. Why not just make it part of the room rate. Nickel and dime costs were frustrating. Tiny little in room fridge would barely hold water bottles.

Not resort quality exept for the pool parking is expensive. Night stays were Way Over expensive when other resorts have better amenities and looks. room smelled like old musty water damage per say and it was a suite definitely do nt waste your money. there only charging you for the name we only stayed there because of seaworld which was awesome but hotel no good.

We loved our stay. Wish we could have stayed longer this hotel was gorgeous. Such a beautiful location looking out over Mission Bay. We walked from the hotel over to the beachfront aprox 1 mile and enjoyed the beachfront trail as well as a few bars restaurant. The hotel does have a gorgeous pool area and the resort fee does include for kayak padleboard on property and sadly we had rain that kept us from using this amenity. Loved the room the bedding the towels spa products. We loved our balcony and the view from the room. We would definitely return again.

Great rooms and location. Remodeled rooms are wonderful. Had great view of the marina and surrounding city. Only problem was location of the room next to elevators kept me up until 2 am. Beds are really comfortable. Lobby remodeled lounge area with fireplaces and great front desk. Called housekeeping to request some items that was shown on list in room like slippers and extra Q tips and they responded quickly and were very nice. Landscape of area is tropical. Will look forward to returning.

Conference attendee. The facility is nice the grounds are pleasant. The rooms above the main check in counters have showers only so no bathtubs. Not sure if the other rooms have tubs. However the bathrooms are very clean roomy and with practical lay out. The rooms are very average have a tiny fridge where you can keep your medications but not much else. There are no microwaves available even in a common area so do not bother bringing back anything you have to heat to eat. The staff are very pleasant.

Great place. Wonderful location great service very clean room. Will still here again. Conference facilities and food also were excellent for the convention. Very quiet. Nice grounds. Easy check in and check out.

Hidden Gem. I have driven past this hotel for 30 years and never thought twice about it. Once you walk through the lobby area you discover an amazing hidden gem. I can not think of a better location in SD Mission Bay. It was an easy walk to the beach bay and we loved the location. The grounds and the pool area are amazing and I will definitely be back.

Mohsin bin salman. Excellent place with excellent service. Just located near the beach the place is beautifully built facility with all requirements. Gym coffee shops restaurants. Centrally located in San Diego this place is a must visit.

Sea view suite. Lovely room with views over the bay. Was attending a business event at the hotel. All the arrangements went very smoothly and the customer service was excellent. Nice range of facilities and close proximity to Mission Beach.

Lovely resort style hotel near airport and on a beautiful marina. Wonderful compound style hotel nestled on San Diegos Mission Bay Marina. Excellent clean rooms and the help is top notch. Great swimming accommodations and spa for those who enjoy that activity. The two restaurants serve good food and the bar near the swimming facilities stays open until 100 pm. Mission Bay Beach area is a five minute ride away and San Diegos Old Town is about a fifteen minute drive away for those who want to explore other restaurants bars and other parts of San Diego.

Wonderful stay. My family and I recently stayed 4 nights at the Hyat Regency Mission Bay. We were very impressed from start to finish with only a few details that offered small detractions from an otherwise excellent stay. We arrived on a Sunday and were immediately pleased with the bright fresh lobby and beautifully landscaped grounds. Our check in was efficient and pleasant. Our room was very clean and well appointed. We were particularly pleased with the decor and have taken some ideas back for our own home renovation. We had a view of the harbour which was so gorgeous on all the lovely sunny days. Our daughter was excited for the pool and water slides which she rated the best of all our stays on this trip. I enjoyed the fact that all the pools were no deeper than 4 feet so felt confident with my daughter ’s safety in the pool. The afternoons were windy though unfortunately and cold. We enjoyed sitting in the gardens in the evening reading and having a snack. We also loved the games provided on the pool deck ping pong connect 4 etc and the fire pit. We did n’t find the dining options great for a family. Both places were fairly expensive for family dining. The pub style restaurant was small with little ambiance. I can appreciate it ’s more for quick bites while pool side but I think the menu could do with a revamp. We found it odd that there was no breakfast restaurant option. We walked to the little market coffee shop which was an enjoyable jaunt but the coffee was really very poor. We enjoyed the pastries though. Recognizing that this is a resort and prices are higher because of that I still felt that the snack gift shop was way out of line in pricing. You should n’t have to pay 450 for a small bag of chip snack mix. Maybe 350 for the convenience. We really loved the chilled fruit infused water offered in the lobby each day. The bell staff were very kind and attentive the tower where we stayed had new and attractive carpeting and the rooms were kept up nicely. We did hear some noise between rooms on one of our nights and always heard the seals but to me that ’s the plus of staying ocean side. A bar of soap was discovered propping up a panel in the ceiling above the bathroom door. Not sure how that got there. Convenient to SeaWorld and Mission Beach. A longer Uber to Balboa Park zoo. Not much close by to walk to but that was fine for us on this particular stay. Overall this hotel was a beautiful stay and we were quite pleased with our whole experience here and in San Diego. We only scratched the surface and we will be back.
friendly staff and great facilities had a blast especially with the swimming pool and hot tub a few more eateries would have been nice but still enjoyed our trip. Lovely hotel and room.

San Diego trip. The view was as portrayed on the website and apart from the lift noises the room was comfortable with the facilities convenient also. The dusty toilet paper holder and the room located back to back with one of the lifts.

Hyat mission bay. Remote TV did nt display tv channel guide. Bed had dip in the midle not good on back. Friendly greeters throughout the lobby. Red pelican good food. Exercise room great. Pool was super.
